summary:
A SALUTE TO CRYPTO: ON THE CUSP OF HISTORY - Today, we stand at the threshold of what could be the most monumental bull run ever witnessed. Whether you were drawn to crypto by the whispers of the Silk Road, influenced by titans like Elon Musk, or swayed by the political discourses of leaders like Trump and Xi Jinping, NGMI Bitch Please honors your journey. We are the resounding clapback to every skeptic who has ever dismissed our path as a fleeting shadow in the financial world.

 THE MEME - The Bitch Please meme erupted in popularity during the early 2010s, featuring the iconic expression of Yao Ming at a press conference. It has thrived in rage comics globally, symbolizing a powerful retort to absurdity.

 $NGMI - 🚀 Ticker: NGMI

No pre-sales. No private deals. No elite insiders.

🤑 A Self-funded Fortress,0 Tax and Tips.

We've settled all accounts with hard cash to KOLs and services, ensuring no shadows linger to dampen our future.

😎 Supply: 1 Billion

Piloted by a meme maestro whose creations soared to a zenith of 5 billion at their peak. We're wired into an extensive network that spans the globe.

👨

Contract Safu and Renounced.

A cadre of over 30 dedicated souls, night and day, weaving our narrative and crafting our destiny with the industry's finest.

 TO THE MOON - HOW TO BUY

1. DOWNLOAD METAMASK WALLET

2. SEND ETH TO THIS WALLET

3. VISIT UNISWAP & INSERT CONTRACT ADDRESS

4. ACQUIRE YOUR $NGMI COINS

It's as Simple as F#CK…

 ROADMAP - PHASE 1

We rally the support of over 100 KOLs. Empower 10,000+ token holders. Fuel daily community engagements via VC & Spaces. Go live on one or two exchanges.

PHASE 2

Engage in high-stakes discussions with Tier 1 Exchanges. Grow to 20,000+ token holders. Ignite a major marketing inferno. Ascend to a $300M market cap.

PHASE 3

Launch on Tier 1 Exchanges. Expand to 40,000+ token holders. Emerge as a top 3 meme coin. Skyrocket to a $1B market cap.

 CRYPTO’S ULTIMATE PAYBACK AGAINST THE VILLAINS - What is $NGMI?

$NGMI is a meme coin, forged as a tribute to the undying spirit of the crypto community.

Which network hosts $NGMI?

Ethereum

Where can I buy $NGMI coins?

Acquire them on uniswap.org

Where should I store my $NGMI?

Secure your $NGMI in a fortress-like wallet.
